price: 22. Libela o kati na yango mpe ya soló, lifuta linene likozuamaka sé epai ya Allah.
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًاۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عِندَهُۥٓ أَجۡرٌ عَظِيمٞ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhā abadan inna al-laha ʿindahu ajrun ʿaẓīmun
